name: inauspicious
content:

showing signs that something will not be successful or positive: inauspicious start After an inauspicious start, Scotland went on to win the match. Synonyms
adverse
disadvantageous
unfavourable UKOpposite
auspicious formal

suggesting that success is not likely: After an inauspicious start, our team went on to win the game 30 to 24.
